name: My First Crush — Girl dress up & love games
name_original: My First Crush — Girl dress up & love games
description:
Princess Elsa has a romantic date, she is very nervous because the boy likes it very much.
The hours go by and she does not know what dress to wear. Your closet is so large that it is difficult to choose, we have to help it !.

Let's dress Elsa with a beautiful dress. She goes to the salon to get her elegant hairstyle; Also choose some heels, and many other accessories, that every girl should use. She will be the center of attention in the restaurant.

There is a great variety of suits to combine as you like.

Do you want to be a fashion designer?
Use your creativity to put together the best combinations.

Be a fashion designer and have fun with our dress up games for girls.

Dress up games for girls.
